CustomField.formula:
CASE( Address_of_Consignee__c, "River HQ", $CustomMetadata.Bill_To_Addresse__mdt.River_HQ.River_Bill_To_Address__c & BR() & $CustomMetadata.Bill_To_Addresse__mdt.River_HQ.River_billToadress2__c & BR() & $CustomMetadata.Bill_To_Addresse__mdt.River_HQ.River_billToAddress3__c & BR() & $CustomMetadata.Bill_To_Addresse__mdt.River_HQ.Pincode__c,
"River Factory", $CustomMetadata.Bill_To_Addresse__mdt.River_Factory.River_Bill_To_Address__c & BR() & $CustomMetadata.Bill_To_Addresse__mdt.River_Factory.River_billToadress2__c & BR() & $CustomMetadata.Bill_To_Addresse__mdt.River_Factory.River_billToAddress3__c & BR() & $CustomMetadata.Bill_To_Addresse__mdt.River_Factory.Pincode__c,
"No Address" )
CustomField.label: Name and Adress of Consignee
